Tabpanel

This is a component that is based off of the Bootstrap .nav-tabs, .tab-content and .tab-pane classes. Like the Box element, this comes with some color modifiers to control the border and background color of both the tabs and associated content panels. For tabbing functionality, the Bootstrap Tabs JavaScript component is used.

  • Purchase Rewards
  • Reading Rewards
  • Talk Time Rewards
Purchase Rewards
Reading Rewards
Talk Time Rewards 
<div class="tabpanel tabpanel-light" role="tabpanel">
  <!-- Nav tabs -->
  <ul class="tabpanel-tabs" role="tablist">
    <li class="active" role="presentation">
      <a role="tab" data-toggle="tab" href="#purchase-rewards">
        Purchase Rewards
      </a>
    </li>
    <li role="presentation">
      <a role="tab" data-toggle="tab" href="#reading-rewards">
        Reading Rewards
      </a>
    </li>
    <li role="presentation">
      <a role="tab" data-toggle="tab" href="#timetalk-rewards">
        Talk Time Rewards
      </a>
    </li>
  </ul>
  <!-- Tab panes -->
  <div class="tabpanel-content">
    <div class="tabpanel-pane active" role="tabpanel" id="purchase-rewards">
      Purchase Rewards
    </div>
    <div class="tabpanel-pane" role="tabpanel" id="reading-rewards">
      Reading Rewards
    </div>
    <div class="tabpanel-pane" role="tabpanel" id="timetalk-rewards">
      Talk Time Rewards
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

Modifiers

Modifier classes of .tabpanel-teal and .tabpanel-tan can be used to control the background color of the component pieces.

  • Foo
  • Bar
Foo
Bar
  • Pizza
  • Hotdog
  • Hamburger
  • Applesauce
Pizza
Hotdog
Hamburger
Applesauce 
<div class="tabpanel tabpanel-light tabpanel-teal" role="tabpanel">
  <!-- Nav tabs -->
  <ul class="tabpanel-tabs" role="tablist">
    <li class="active" role="presentation">
      <a role="tab" data-toggle="tab" href="#foo-tab-example">
        Foo
      </a>
    </li>
    <li role="presentation">
      <a role="tab" data-toggle="tab" href="#bar-tab-example">
        Bar
      </a>
    </li>
  </ul>
  <!-- Tab panes -->
  <div class="tabpanel-content">
    <div class="tabpanel-pane active" role="tabpanel" id="foo-tab-example">
      Foo
    </div>
    <div class="tabpanel-pane" role="tabpanel" id="bar-tab-example">
      Bar
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="tabpanel tabpanel-lighter tabpanel-tan u-margin-top" role="tabpanel">
  <!-- Nav tabs -->
  <ul class="tabpanel-tabs" role="tablist">
    <li role="presentation">
      <a class="text-truncate" role="tab" data-toggle="tab" href="#pizza-tab-example">
        Pizza
      </a>
    </li>
    <li class="active" role="presentation">
      <a class="text-truncate" role="tab" data-toggle="tab" href="#hotdog-tab-example">
        Hotdog
      </a>
    </li>
    <li role="presentation">
      <a class="text-truncate" role="tab" data-toggle="tab" href="#hamburger-tab-example">
        Hamburger
      </a>
    </li>
    <li role="presentation">
      <a class="text-truncate" role="tab" data-toggle="tab" href="#applesauce-tab-example">
        Applesauce
      </a>
    </li>
  </ul>
  <!-- Tab panes -->
  <div class="tabpanel-content">
    <div class="tabpanel-pane" role="tabpanel" id="pizza-tab-example">
      Pizza
    </div>
    <div class="tabpanel-pane active" role="tabpanel" id="hotdog-tab-example">
      Hotdog
    </div>
    <div class="tabpanel-pane" role="tabpanel" id="hamburger-tab-example">
      Hamburger
    </div>
    <div class="tabpanel-pane" role="tabpanel" id="applesauce-tab-example">
      Applesauce
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

Full Width

The .tabpanel-full modifier will allow each pane to reach the edge of its container. Variants exist to apply selectively for different breakpoints, such as .tabpanel-full-xs.

  • Ren
  • Stimpy
Ren Höek
Stimpson J. Cat 
<div class="tabpanel tabpanel-full tabpanel-light" role="tabpanel">
  <!-- Nav tabs -->
  <ul class="tabpanel-tabs" role="tablist">
    <li class="active" role="presentation">
      <a role="tab" data-toggle="tab" href="#ren-tab-example">
        Ren
      </a>
    </li>
    <li role="presentation">
      <a role="tab" data-toggle="tab" href="#stimpy-tab-example">
        Stimpy
      </a>
    </li>
  </ul>
  <!-- Tab panes -->
  <div class="tabpanel-content">
    <div class="tabpanel-pane active" role="tabpanel" id="ren-tab-example">
      Ren H&ouml;ek
    </div>
    <div class="tabpanel-pane" role="tabpanel" id="stimpy-tab-example">
      Stimpson J. Cat
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
